text: Wang Xiuyou also written as Wang Xiuyu or Wang Hsin Yu (born January 1956) is a Chinese former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1970s. As a young rider, aged 17, Wang Xiuyou represented China, as part of the national team together with Jiang Youfeng, at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1973. She finished 23rd overall. She also competed at other international competitions. She also participated at the 1975 World Junior Speed Skating Championships. She set her personal best during different competitions in Japan in 1977. She rode her last competition in 1978. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Chinese female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Wang Xiuyou
